tender.title: Construction of road from Hathkhola Shiv Mandir to Janata Patla LP School under via Kalbari Gwjwnpur LP School under Ramchatary VCDC with 3 nos box type culvert approximately 3.1 Km under Ramchatary VCDC, Salbari, Baksa, under CMs Goodwill Mission P
